summary: When a young soldier in Vietnam gets dumped by his hometown girl, he and his best friend decide to go AWOL and return to the States to win her back.
cast: Liam Hemsworth|Austin Stowell|Teresa Palmer|Aimee Teegarden|Chris Lowell|Wyatt Russell|Max Adler|Delvon Roe|Michael Ellison|Chris Newman|Gordon Michaels|Julian Gant|Chase Yi|Claire Richards|Roger Callard|Lauren Mae Shafer|Charlotte Ubben|Ricky Wayne|Cindy Chu|Apollo Bacala|Christine Bell|Randal Bruce|Madison Conradis|Elise Edson|Tiffani Elise Edwards|Robert Forte Shannon III|Andrew Freij|Wally Ibironke|Tim Jenkins|Patrick Potochick|Greg Prusiewicz|DaJuan Manwell Rippy|Nicholas Ritz|Stephanie Schaberg|Morris Lee Sullivan|Melody Teodoro-Kurtis
title: Amor y honor
